contentencoded: Airing on Tuesday, June 16, 2015: Goldman Sachs gets into business with ... normal humans. Plus, in recent undercover tests, the Transportation Security Administration failed to detect weapons and explosives in 95 percent of trials. The TSA’s acting boss was immediately reassigned. We look at what it would take to improve the TSA. Next: In our series "Weak Link: The state of infrastructure," seismologist Lucy Jones explains why it’s important for scientists to learn how to tell stories and to engage the public in difficult but critical subjects like infrastructure.
